stop_collection_client_paid_directly.displayName: Stop Collection for Direct Full Payment
stop_collection_client_paid_directly.description: Stops the collection process for a case and mark it as paid directly to the creditor.

stop_collection_for_direct_instalment_pa.displayName: Stop Collection for Direct Instalment Payment
stop_collection_for_direct_instalment_pa.description: Stops the collection process for a case when an instalment plan is set up with the creditor.

stop_collection_for_direct_partial_payme.displayName: Stop Collection for Direct Partial Payment
stop_collection_for_direct_partial_payme.description: Stops the collection process for a case and mark it as partially paid directly to the creditor.

new_campaign_creation.description: Triggers when the campaign is created.

new_cancelled_case.description: Triggers when a collection process for a given sequence (case) was cancelled.

new_disputed_case.description: Triggers when a collection process was disputed by the debtor.

new_payout.description: Triggers when a payout is successfully sent to your bank account.

new_successful_collection_paid_to_credit.displayName: New Successful Collection Paid to Creditor
new_successful_collection_paid_to_credit.description: Triggers when a debt is paid directly to the creditor.

new_successful_collection_via_legal_offi.displayName: New Successful Collection via Legal Officer
new_successful_collection_via_legal_offi.description: Triggers when a debt is paid to the Legal Officer responsible for the collection campaign.
